notes.note: Implemented Quantum CSS (also known as Stylo) in Android for faster page rendering
Added View Page Source option to the Page Action menu

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
text:
Firefox 60 offers something for everyone and a little something extra for everyone who [deploys Firefox in an enterprise environment][0]. This release includes changes that give you more content and more ways to customize your New Tab/Firefox Home. It also introduces support for the Web Authentication API, which means you can log in to websites in Firefox with USB tokens like YubiKey. 
Firefox 60 also brings a new policy engine and Group Policy support for enterprise deployments. For more info about why and how to use Firefox in the enterprise, see [this blog post][1]. 

Thank you to all of the [new Mozillians][2] who contributed to this release of Firefox!

[0]: https://www.mozilla.org/firefox/enterprise/
[1]: https://medium.com/mozilla-tech/open-for-business-firefox-quantum-is-ready-for-it-622c74fe13fe
[2]: https://blog.mozilla.org/community/2018/05/02/firefox-60-new-contributors/
title: Firefox for Android 60.0 Release
